com.semartinez.projects.choppit.model.entity

Class Step

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.semartinez.projects.choppit.model.entity.Step

  • public class Step
extends Object
    Steps are child entities of Recipes. Each Step consists of an instruction String, and recipe order integer.

      • Step

        public Step(long recipeId,
            @NotNull
            @NotNull String instructions,
            int recipeOrder)
        Parameters:
        recipeId - is the id of the parent Recipe.
        instructions - is the instruction text.
        recipeOrder - is the order to display this Step in its Recipe.

      • setRecipeOrder
